frontmatter.title: True meaning of Christmas
frontmatter.description: What is Christmas about? Why do we celebrate it? These are all some great questions. Let's take a look at the true meaning of Christmas

frontmatter.title: Latest Updates!
frontmatter.description: It's been awhile since you guys have heard from me. Some of you may be wondering what happened to me?

frontmatter.title: Happy Thanksgiving
frontmatter.description: We can give thanks to God in all times in life. God deserves all our praise

frontmatter.title: Gifts of the Holy Spirit
frontmatter.description: Did you know that when you accept the free gift of salvation that you receive the Holy Spirit. It is the goal of the Holy Spirit to transform you to become like Jesus through a process that is called sanctification. Let's look at one way the Holy Spirit does this. Which, is through spiritual gifts

frontmatter.title: God opposes the proud
frontmatter.description: Before I talk about the mercy of God. Let's look at the definition of mercy. I did a search online and this is what I found. 'Compassion or forgiveness shown toward someone whom it is within one's power to punish or harm.'

verses.overrideVerse: [7] Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you. (ESV)
[11] Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil. (ESV)
[8] Be sober-minded; be watchful. Your adversary the devil prowls around like a roaring lion, seeking someone to devour. (ESV)

[4] For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith. [5] Who is it that overcomes the world except the one who believes that Jesus is the Son of God? (ESV)
[7] casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you. (ESV)

[8] Finally, brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think about these things. (ESV)

frontmatter.title: God always delivers His people
frontmatter.description: Ever feel like you are going through something impossible in your life. Something you are not sure how it will end. A serious trial that you feel may never end. Maybe the coronavirus has you feeling the blues. Or maybe it’s the racial inequities that have you feeling that way. This is the work of the enemy

frontmatter.title: What to do when life falls apart
frontmatter.description: The Corona Virus has caused many to fear. Some to question if the world is really falling apart. Do you feel this way? How do you respond?Some will turn to social media. Which, could cause you to panic. Some may turn to drugs. Some may turn to alcohol. Some may even consider suicide. What should we really do? Turn to God. He is your refuge and your strength!
